item.field: William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy, DeForest Kelley, Nichelle Nichols, James Doohan, George Takei, Walter Koenig, Grace Lee Whitney, Majel Barrett
Classic & Cult TV, TV Action & Adventure, TV Sci-Fi & Fantasy
Led by unflappable Capt. Kirk, the crew of the starship Enterprise delves deep into the far reaches of space to explore new worlds and civilizations.
